TI RETRACTED: Design of Bit Error Rate Tester Based on a High Speed Bit and
   Sequence Synchronization (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE BER tester; M sequence genetator; PLL; Inserting error-bit; bit
   synchronization; sequence synchronization
AB In traditional BER (Bit Error Rate) tester, bit synchronization applied digital PLL and sequence synchronization utilized sequence's correlation. It resulted in a low speed on bit and sequence synchronization. This paper came up new method to realize bit and sequence synchronization. which were Bit-edge-tracking method and Immitting-sequence method. The BER tester based on FPGA was designed. The functions of inserting error-bit and removing the false sequence synchronization were added. The results of Debugging and simulating display that the time to realize bit synchronization is less than a bit width, the lagged time of the tracking bit pulse is 1/8 of the code cycle, and there is only a M sequence's cycle to realize sequence synchronization. This new BER tester has many advantages, such as a short time to realize bit and sequence synchronization, no false sequence synchronization, testing the ability of the receiving port's error -correcting and a simple hardware. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.

TI RETRACTED: An Efficient Sequence Retrieval Method Based on Motion
   Capture Data (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Human motion retrieval; ICA; ISODATA
AB In this paper, a novel approach is presented for the motion retrieval based on the similarity of the motion data. For each sequence in the database, the Independent Component Analysis (ICA) algorithm is used to extract features, the reference vector's distribution is estimated instead of the original data. The reference vector is clustered using Iterative Self-organizing Data Analysis Techniques Algorithm (ISODATA). Finally the similarity between the query example and motion sequence in the database is measured using the Mahalanobis distance. Experimental results on the CMU datab(a)ase demonstrate that the proposed approach achieves good performance. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.
C1 [Wei, Xiaopeng; Yao, Shulei; Zhang, Qiang] Dalian Univ Technol, Minist Educ, Key Lab Adv Design & Intelligent Comp, Dalian, Peoples R China.

TI RETRACTED: The Computer Aided Design of Stone Slab Paving (Retracted
   Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE

DE Stone slab paving; Stone slab numbering; Object ARX; CAD Secondary
   development
AB The aims of this paper is to study a computer aided design method of stone slab paving which is based on the AutoCAD's secondary development tools of ObjectARX in the development environment of VC++2005. NET. The ObjectARX development technology and the realization principle of the stone slab paving system are introduced in the paper. Paving dialog is designed with VC++ to realize stone parametric paving, and the engineering slabs can be numbered automatically with the use of extended data. Moreover the design and connection of various menus are completed in the paper. The function of stone slab paving system is shown by giving an example, and the paving result is analyzed and summed up in the end. The paving of complex zones can be finished automatically by computer software instead of manual work. It has improved the design process of stone decoration. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. TI RETRACTED: A Study on Application of Multidimensional Association Rule
   Mining in Adverse Drug Reactions (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE data cube; multidimensional association rule; Adverse Drug Reactions
   (ADRs)
AB With the serious problem of adverse drug reactions (ADRs), we conduct multi-dimensional association rule mining method based on data cube with online analytical processing technology (OLAP) by establishing multi-dimensional database of ADRs. The slicing technique of OLAP operation is introduced into the mining process to mine multidimensional association relationship of ADRs and finally explore the useful and deep knowledge hidden in ADRs. The example presents some good prospects in the field of adverse drug reactions, which also paves a solid foundation for further evaluation and early warning on adverse drug reactions. This is significantly meaningful to provide supports for prescription on the illnesses treatments. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. TI RETRACTED: Navigation solution with Wavelet and Allan variance

CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE Allan Variance; Wavelet Denoising; MEMS; Navigation
AB Recent advent of micromachining revolutionized the conventional inertial navigation applications. From robotics, biomedical equipment and mining to high precision aerospace applications, low cost, easily manufactured Micro Electro Mechanical Systems (MEMS) inertial sensors had made their way with partial success. Although their synergism with GPS proved beneficial in most cases, GPS overall un reliability and frequent outages forced research scholars to design intelligent stochastic error modeling techniques to account for time dependent, huge, non Gaussian, uncorrelated and environment dependent errors. The noise behavior of MEMS can be divided broadly in high frequency and low frequency types. This paper explores Allan variance technique in characterizing low frequency stochastic errors in addition with Wavelet Denoising technique to filter high frequency noise or white noise. After using these techniques with Extended Kalman Filter, integration of GPS with IMU gave significant improvement in presence of GPS outages. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.
C1 [Siddiqui, Saman Mukhtar; Fang Jiancheng] Beihang Univ, 37 Xueyuan, Beijing 100191, Peoples R China.

TI RETRACTED: Design and implementation of automatic control system of
   oxygen-enriched air & top-blown copper smelting furnace based on DCS
   (Retracted Article)
SO 2011 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE-ICEES
   2011
SE Energy Procedia
LA English
DT Proceedings Paper; Retracted Publication
CT International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science (ICEES)
CY OCT, 2011
CL Singapore, SINGAPORE
SP Singapore Inst Elect (SIE)
DE copper smelting; batch control strategies; secondary batch algorithm;
   air-oxygen-oil control strategies; process control; DCS
AB Top-blown furnace is known to be effectively adopted in copper smelting. This paper elaborates automatic control strategies of oxygen-enriched air & top-blown smelting system based on the real project named KUNPENG COPPER SMELTER in China. We design and implement a control system by using several novel schemes, such as batch algorithm, secondary batch algorithm, feed rate algorithm, and propose a method of automatic process control of air, oxygen and oil in smelting mode, including requirement calculation, ratio control, selective control and multi-mode output control. Meanwhile, the configuration of the smelting control system based on Emerson DeltaV is introduced. The result reported is remarkable that the reaction is complete and the high temperature is stable and maintainable. (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier Ltd. Selection and/or peer-review under responsibility of the Organizers of 2011 International Conference on Energy and Environmental Science.
C1 China Nonferrous Engn & Res Inst, Dept Automat, Beijing, Peoples R China.
RP Ye, C (reprint author), China Nonferrous Engn & Res Inst, Dept Automat, Beijing, Peoples R China.
